dialogue.line: Wait, be quiet, I am a %%VTfriend%%...

dialogue.option: What the hell, who are you?

dialogue.line: I shouldn't be here, but I had to follow my loved ones.
My name is not important now.. ..my family is %%RDfreezing to death%%. I need your help..

dialogue.option: How did you enter the ship? There are no passenger..

dialogue.line: There are passengers, but you cant see them. They are in the freight capsules on the sides of the ship.
Guess all of them are %%GR"volunteers"%% from earth. They are in stasis, a deep sleep.
My wife and son volunteered to pay our debts. I told them it would be a bad idea to sign to "Availability on Demand".
Check the %%GRfreight notes%%, or open the freight capsules with the %%GRcontrol terminal%%.
I will stay here, but please hurry, my family is still %%RDfreezing%%.
